item.title: By: What Is A Service Designer and Why Do You Care? | Off the Shelf
item.dc:creator: What Is A Service Designer and Why Do You Care? | Off the Shelf
item.description: […] for the opening on the Web User Experience Team created by the departure of Tab McDaniel (to Barcelona, in case you missed it), we re-titled the job. Instead of a UX Designer, we are looking for a […]
item.content:encoded: […] for the opening on the Web User Experience Team created by the departure of Tab McDaniel (to Barcelona, in case you missed it), we re-titled the job. Instead of a UX Designer, we are looking for a […]

item.title: By: Tab McDaniel
item.dc:creator: Tab McDaniel
item.description: Aww! Thanks everybody for your kind wishes. I've really enjoyed my time at the Library, and getting to work with such a great group of folks. If you find yourself in Barcelona ....
item.content:encoded: Aww! Thanks everybody for your kind wishes. I’ve really enjoyed my time at the Library, and getting to work with such a great group of folks. If you find yourself in Barcelona ….

item.title: By: Sarah McClung
item.dc:creator: Sarah McClung
item.description: I will miss our Muni run ins and our great chats, Tab! Wishing you all the best!
item.content:encoded: I will miss our Muni run ins and our great chats, Tab! Wishing you all the best!

item.title: By: Kemi Amin
item.dc:creator: Kemi Amin
item.description:
My cubicle buddy is leaving! Who will hear and respond to my random work noises, like "ugh" and "ack" and "ahhh"?!
All the best to you on your new journey Tab. Learned a ton working with you and thoroughly enjoyed our over-the-wall exchanges.
item.content:encoded:
My cubicle buddy is leaving! Who will hear and respond to my random work noises, like “ugh” and “ack” and “ahhh”?!

All the best to you on your new journey Tab. Learned a ton working with you and thoroughly enjoyed our over-the-wall exchanges.

item.title: By: Charles Macquarie
item.dc:creator: Charles Macquarie
item.description: We will miss you so much Tab!! But you would sure be heading to worse places, so cheers for this fabulous move.
item.content:encoded: We will miss you so much Tab!! But you would sure be heading to worse places, so cheers for this fabulous move.

item.title: By: Shauna Hannibal
item.dc:creator: Shauna Hannibal
item.description: wow! how fantastic! and sad for us. Congrats, Tab!
item.content:encoded: wow! how fantastic! and sad for us. Congrats, Tab!

item.title: By: Aira Lipson
item.dc:creator: Aira Lipson
item.description: Congratulations Tab. What an exciting adventure!

item.title: By: Jason Hedrick
item.dc:creator: Jason Hedrick
item.description: Congratulations Tab! Sad to see you go, but LOVE where you're going! Not unlike yourself, Barcelona RULES!!! (But you already know that!) Good luck and I can't wait to visit you out there!
item.content:encoded: Congratulations Tab! Sad to see you go, but LOVE where you’re going! Not unlike yourself, Barcelona RULES!!! (But you already know that!) Good luck and I can’t wait to visit you out there!

item.title: By: Tab McDaniel
item.dc:creator: Tab McDaniel
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/2017/11/06/farewell-tab-mcdaniel/#comment-733">Min-Lin Fang</a>.
Thanks Min-Lin!

item.title: By: Min-Lin Fang
item.dc:creator: Min-Lin Fang
item.description: What a life-changing experience you will have! Congratulations!
item.content:encoded: What a life-changing experience you will have! Congratulations!
